divs: sighting detailsoutside on my porch on 09\11\10 at 925 pm, zip 02324. looking up about 30 degrees above horizon south, south south west saw object in sky that appeared to be a plane in the distance. object was traveling north, northeast at a steady rate when it suddenly cut 90 degrees "down" towards the ground, then again turned at a sharp 45 degrees to return north, northeast. it then disappeared from sight.
Summary: Object in sky makes massive sharp angle turns.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Bridgewater
There were no other sightings in Bridgewater on or around September 11th 2010
